history.content:
CS & CS-intended students, see L&S' update regarding advising this week:

Due to recent repairs and lack of heat, our advising offices in Evans Hall will be closed January 13 - 17.  With the building temperature expected at 54 or 55 degrees, we want to protect our staff and our students who would visit.  
During January 13 - 17, 156 Dwinelle will be open to schedule in-person and Google Hangout appointments.  Students can also schedule appointments by calling 510/642-1483.
MonTuTh:  9am to noon, 1pm to 4pm
Wed:  1pm to 4pm
Fri:  9am to noon, 1pm to 3pm 
We have messaged our students.
Both advising locations will re-open on Tuesday, January 21.  This also begins our peak period advising, and we will open at 9am, not 1pm, for three consecutive Wednesdays.
history.subject: L&S, Undergraduate Advising, January 13 - 17, 2020
